experiment_name: Directed Evolution of a Fluorinase for Improved Fluorination Efficiency with a Non-native Substrate
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:37°C;    reaction_ph:nan;    reaction_other_conditions:Enzyme: fluorinase lysates (182 µL in 260 µL final volume);     Reaction time: 4 h;     Host strain: E. coli BL21 (DE3) DPNP (nucleoside phosphorylase knocked out);    reaction_substrate_concentration:1 mM 5'-CIDA, 0.5 mM L-Met, 200 mM Fluoride (from NaF)
